mapper.select: select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = 'cBSS云化迁移'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '纵向加工'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '一体化集群'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '存量平台'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '对外服务'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '能力开放平台(亦庄)'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = 'IP溯源集群'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '信令西电集群'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '能力开放平台'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '精准营销'

select t.operation "operation", t.total_nodes "total_nodes", t.storage_total "storage_total", t.mem_rate "mem_rate", t.mem_warn "mem_warn", t.mem_crit "mem_crit", t.cpu_rate "cpu_rate", t.cpu_warn "cpu_warn", t.cpu_crit "cpu_crit", t.active_nodes "active_nodes" from PLAT_HADOOP_DETAIL t where t.operation = '固网集群'
